addition.202: * <li>Underscores ('_') are permitted within parts (not the first or
addition.204: * <li>Dashes ('-') are permitted as the last character of parts (in
addition.205: *     addition to being permitted within parts, per the standard).
addition.244: private static final CharMatcher UNDERSCORE_MATCHER = CharMatcher.is('_');
addition.246: private static final CharMatcher DASH_OR_UNDERSCORE_MATCHER = CharMatcher.anyOf("-_");
addition.284: // No initial dash or underscore. No final underscore.

removed.202: * <li>Underscores ('_') are permitted wherever dashes ('-') are permitted.
